name: 張素薰
objective: 本課程旨在培養學生熟悉日常生活英語會話及以正常速度聽講之能力。課程內容取材自學生周遭所熟悉事務, 藉由媒體傳播素材來訓練學生經常聽講之能力，並在課堂中研討其內容以達到運用之目的。
schedule:
Multimedia English Listening and Speaking

Objective:

This course is designed to familiarize students with daily spoken English as well as listening and speaking skills. The content includes a wide variety of authentic multimedia materials-printed audio and video texts. This gives students an opportunity for both recognition of different speaking styles and an in-depth, culture-rich understanding of the topics from multiple perspectives. Real-life situations are rehearsed in the classroom, with role-plays, situational activities, excerpts from newspapers and magazines and interviews with real people. Speaking practices based on day-to-day language are emphasized in class.

Basic Doctrines:

1.　　Expose students to cosmopolitan themes that are up-to-date, sophisticated and varied in tone, with a view to stimulating students more profoundly and to accelerating their retaining and using in the target language.
2.　　The films and magazines of contextually rich—cultural background and competent knowledge-related to the corresponding themes are provided to integrate the skills of the target language.
3.　　Language capability and performance are equally stressed and developed.
4.　　Students’ active participation is essentially required.
5.　　Individual reflection is perceived by pair and group works, out-of-class assignments for review and research, oral reports and specific presentations.

Assessment:

1.　　Weekly tests and Attendance (20 points maximum deduction). 80%
2.　　Oral reports and presentations. 20%
